tool_description: This API shows a technical analysis on the most common pairs.
name: Trade Signals
title: Trade Signals

api_list.name: Get Tech Analysis
api_list.description: Returns the analysis based on the timeframe

optional_parameters.name: timeframe
optional_parameters.description:
This field informs the timeframe of the analysis.
The default value is 300 (5 minutes), and you could change to 60 (1 minute), 300 (5 minutes) or 900 (15 minutes)
